talk.author: did:plc:g52aevwvwnqazaztqmd6tsmc
talk.utter: Sorawo is such a fantastic character. We need more protagonists that are allowed to be fucked up, rude and standoffish

talk.author: did:plc:buiwqzl32igmibjyerytoeiw
talk.utter:
A reviewer I used to follow once put out a scathing review of V1 calling Sorawo "the quintessential LN protag" and it was so baffling that it became a minor running joke between me and some friends lol.

Same review also bemoaned Kozakura and her "little-sister affectations"

talk.author: did:plc:g52aevwvwnqazaztqmd6tsmc
talk.utter: they read the secret version of the novel where Sorawo is normal
